      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int calcNumberOfTrays(PolynomialSplineFunction equilibrium)
      This method calculates the number of trays by using the McCabe-Thiele method by stepping between the binary equilibrium curve calculated using the spline function and the stripping and enriching lines.

      • calcNumberOfTrays

        public int calcNumberOfTrays(PolynomialSplineFunction equilibrium)
        This method calculates the number of trays by using the McCabe-Thiele method by stepping between the binary equilibrium curve calculated using the spline function and the stripping and enriching lines.
        Specified by:
        calcNumberOfTrays in interface McCabeThiele
